channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

item.title: CVE-2022-21503|2024-08-03T02:46:38.948Z -- oracle%20corporation -- oracle%20cloud%20infrastructure
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure product of Oracle Cloud Services. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access to compromise Oracle Cloud Infrastructure. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure accessible data. All affected customers were notified of CVE-2022-21503 by Oracle. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N)
